meanings.definition: The state of being foolish or lacking intelligence.
meanings.sent1: Her gormlessness was evident when she tried to put a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent2: His gormlessness often led to him making silly mistakes at work.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gormlessness, he always managed to make us laugh with his antics.
meanings.sent4: Her gormlessness was like a dark cloud overshadowing her otherwise bright personality.
meanings.sent5: The gormlessness of the character made the audience sympathize with his struggles.

meanings.definition: The quality of being clueless or lacking awareness.
meanings.sent1: The gormlessness of the new employee was evident when he asked the same question multiple times.
meanings.sent2: She navigated through the party with gormlessness, unaware of the social cues around her.
meanings.sent3: His gormlessness in social situations often led to awkward encounters.
meanings.sent4: The gormlessness of the child was like a blank canvas waiting to be filled with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Despite her gormlessness, she approached every new challenge with enthusiasm.
